name: Stack o' Slime
description:
-Description-

Start your journey as 1 slime, unite with your other slime friends and try to get as many slimes as possible to the finish line safely :P

-Controls-
A & D to move left and right

W / Space to jump

S to remove a slime from yourself

-Credits-

Josh Marlowe [www.jmargames.com] - Programmer

SpoilThatSong - Sound Designer

Ballisticannon - Level Designer, Game Designer

Emre Ozan - Game Designer

Aly Khalifa - Level Designer, Game Designer
